title: Drug promoted by Trump as coronavirus ‘game changer’ increasingly linked to deaths
description: As the president continues to pitch hydroxychloroquine, several medical experts have called for the Food and Drug Administration to revoke its emergency use authorization.
content:
The latest on the pandemic and the Trump administrations response
